snippet: The steel and mining giant reduced its losses in the first quarter, with a small profit in Europe indicating the start of a turnaround.
abstract: ArcelorMittal says it had loss of $200 million in its first quarter, less than $345 million loss it posted for same period in 2013; report is taken as sign that conditions are improving in steel industry, considered bellwether for overall economic activity.
lead_paragraph: The steel and mining giant reduced its losses in the first quarter, with a small profit in Europe indicating the start of a turnaround.
